Summary: bronze colored object, slowly moving up and down,then left in a blink of a eye
divs: sighting detailsi was at gregory lumber yard unloading logs from my truck,i noticed the sun\cloud cover was strange,when this object just came into view,i knew instantly it was not of this world,i ran to the truck to get my camara phone and took 5 pictures within 2 mins.it was glowing metal with the sun reflecting off of it,it moved slowly up and down,turning side to side very slowly,it left the area faster than the blink of a eye,i had a strange feeling come over me,erie,wanting it to stay and leave at the same time,it sent shivers down my spine,i know what i seen was not of this world
trends: There have been no other sightings in Chatham
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
